The City's Finest Views

  1. Post WotC: Allied Crossplay
    The City's Finest Views     [Source: Waste|Lands FAQ]
    Just like characters with stations already on them, a character cannot take the Observation Deck station on a Titan with that station unless the Titan is tapped. You can tap The Cityâ€™s Finest Views when the Titan is tapped to help you remember.
